src:
Fotballtoppen utelukker ikke Haaland-salg etter det vanvittige m√•lshowet
Erling Braut Haaland er i form om dagen. Sjefen hans i Red Bull Salzburg utelukker ikke at 19-√•ringen en dag forlater klubben.
06 Nov 2019, 06:03 by P√•l Strande Gamlemoen
Da Salzburg-spiller Hwang Hee-chan ble felt innenfor 16-meteren i tirsdagens Champions League-kamp mot Napoli, var det ingen tvil: Det straffesparket skulle Erling Braut Haaland ta. Den 19 √•r gamle spissen fra J√¶ren plukket opp ballen s√• √• si umiddelbart etter at dommeren hadde pekt p√• straffemerket.
S√• sendte han Napoli-keeper Alex Meret √©n vei, f√∏r han plasserte ballen i motsatt hj√∏rne. Dermed st√•r Haaland med hele syv Champions League-m√•l p√• fire kamper. Ingen har scoret s√• mange m√•l p√• sine f√∏rste fire kamper i den gjeve turneringen.
Han er giftig ogs√• i den √∏sterrikske eliteserien. Der har han scoret tolv m√•l p√• elleve kamper. Om man tar med m√•lene hans i den hjemlige cupen ogs√•, har han et scoringssnitt p√• vanvittige 1,37 m√•l pr. kamp denne sesongen.


LES OGS√Ö: Rekord-Haaland fortsatte m√•lshowet i Champions League: ‚Äì Jeg lever dr√∏mmen





Slike tall blir det naturligvis rykter av. Mekanismene i fotballverden er ikke vanskeligere enn det. VG m√∏tte Red Bull Salzburg-direkt√∏r Christoph Freund etter kampen mot Napoli. Han sitter p√• mye av ansvaret hvis Haaland en dag skal hentes av en st√∏rre klubb.
‚Äì Jeg har h√∏rt mange rykter den siste uken, men det er bra. Vi er stolte over at en spiller som Erling er i Salzburg. Han har n√• syv m√•l i Champions League. Vi f√•r se hva som skjer i fremtiden. For √∏yeblikket er han i Salzburg og forh√•pentlig er han ogs√• det de kommende m√•nedene. Samtidig kjenner vi denne bransjen, sa Freund til VG ‚Äì og utelukket dermed ikke en fremtidig overgang.


Christoph Freund utelukker ikke at Haalands m√•lform kan ta han vekk fra Red Bull Salzburg. Sportsdirekt√∏ren vet hvordan fotballen fungerer.üì∑ MATHIAS MANDL / BILDBYR√ÖN

Overgangsvinduet √•pner som kjent i januar, men Freund mener Haaland og Salzburg er ¬´en perfekt match¬ª for √∏yeblikket. Hovedpersonen selv ser ikke ut til √• v√¶re i noe hastverk med √• komme seg videre.
‚Äì Jeg spiller bare fotball. Jeg koser meg. Det er det som er fokuset mitt, sa Haaland til VG etter Napoli-kampen, som endte 1‚Äì1.
H√•pet om avansement til utslagsrundene i Champions League lever fortsatt for Haaland og Salzburg, men bare s√• vidt. Med to gruppespillskamper igjen ligger laget fire poeng bak Napoli p√• annenplass og ni bak Liverpool. Dermed m√• laget sl√• b√•de Sander Berges Genk og Liverpool, samtidig som andre resultater g√•r deres vei, for √• kunne g√• videre.
S√• gjenst√•r det √• se om den norske spisskometen fortsatt er i Salzburg n√•r det drar seg til utover v√•ren.
text:
The football team does not exclude Haaland sales after the crazy goal show
Erling Braut Haaland is in shape by day. His boss at Red Bull Salzburg does not rule out the 19-year-old leaving the club one day.
06 Nov 2019, 06:03 by P√•l Strande Gamlemoen
When Salzburg player Hwang Hee-chan was fielded within the 16-meter in Tuesday's Champions League game against Naples, there was no doubt: That penalty should be taken by Erling Braut Haaland. The 19-year-old J√¶ren striker picked up the ball almost immediately after the referee pointed to the penalty mark.
Then he sent Napoli keeper Alex Meret one way, before placing the ball in the opposite corner. Thus, Haaland stands with a total of seven Champions League goals in four games. No one has scored as many goals in their first four games of the winning tournament.
He is also toxic in the Austrian elite series. There he has scored twelve goals in eleven games. If you include his goals in the domestic cup as well, he has a scoring average of crazy 1.37 goals per game. fight this season.


ALSO READ: Record-Haaland continued the Champions League goal show: - I live the dream





Of course, such figures are rumored. The mechanisms of the football world are no more difficult than that. VG met Red Bull Salzburg director Christoph Freund after the game against Naples. He has a lot of responsibility if one day Haaland is to be picked up by a bigger club.
- I've heard many rumors this past week, but it's good. We are proud that a player like Erling is in Salzburg. He now has seven goals in the Champions League. We'll see what happens in the future. He is currently in Salzburg and hopefully he will be there in the coming months. At the same time, we know this industry, Freund told VG - and thus did not rule out a future transition.


Christoph Freund does not rule out that Haaland's goal form can take him away from Red Bull Salzburg. The Sports Director knows how football works.üì∑ MATHIA'S MANDL / PHOTO AGENCY

The transition window opens as is well known in January, but Freund believes Haaland and Salzburg are "a perfect match" at the moment. The protagonist himself does not appear to be in any hurry to move forward.
- I just play football. I'm enjoying myself. That's what my focus is, Haaland told VG after the Naples match, which ended 1-1.
The hope of advancing to the knockout rounds in the Champions League is still alive for Haaland and Salzburg, but only so far. With two group games remaining, the team is four points behind Napoli in second place and nine behind Liverpool. Thus, the team must beat both Sander Berges Genk and Liverpool, while other results go their way, in order to move forward.
Then it remains to be seen if the Norwegian eating comet is still in Salzburg when it comes out in the spring.
